words.source: Wayyiqtol form: vav-consecutive + yiqtol of אמר (to say). KJV, ESV, NASB, HCSB
Proper noun, subject of the verb. All translations
Preposition אל (to) + 3rd masculine plural pronoun. KJV, ESV, NASB, HCSB
Negative particle אל (prohibitive/negation). KJV 'Oh, not so', ESV 'Oh no', NASB 'Oh no', HCSB 'No'
Particle of entreaty/politeness. KJV 'I pray thee', ESV 'please', NASB 'please', HCSB 'please'
Noun אדון (lord) + 1st singular possessive suffix. KJV 'my Lord', ESV 'my lords', NASB 'my lords', HCSB 'my lords'
